test_description: Text says mobile, image might show desktop
text_input:
Build a desktop application for restaurant management.
            Must run on Windows 10 and above.
            Should include inventory management and billing features.

intent.purpose: Build a desktop application for restaurant management.
intent.problem_being_solved: Manage restaurant operations including inventory and billing.

requirements.text: Must run on Windows 10 and above.

constraints.text: Platform must be Windows 10 and above.
constraints.impact: Limits the application to Windows users.

conflicts_and_ambiguities.issue: Image content is unrelated to the desktop application request.

evidence.image: Contains food delivery and grocery shopping app interface.

conflicts_and_ambiguities.impact: No impact on the desktop application requirements.

assumptions.assumption: The application does not need to integrate with mobile platforms.
assumptions.risk_if_wrong: May need additional development for cross-platform compatibility.
